Dgame.Math.Vertex



struct Vertex;
The Vertex struct contains 3 components for x, y and z which are stored in a static float array. Vertex is a minimalistic structure for coordinates, compared to Vector2 and Pixel.

Author:
rschuett

float[3] data;
The Data

this(float x, float y, float z = 0F);
CTor

this(ushort x, ushort y, ushort z = 0);
CTor

void opAssign(ref const Vertex v);
opAssign

const pure nothrow bool opEquals(ref const Vertex v);
opEquals

const Vector2f asVector();
Convert the Vertex into a Vector2 Means, that only the x and y coordinate are represented.
